creator: jpl@remotejava.com
text: When you forget to close a tag imported from a library, Jasper reports an error during compilation including the tag name enclosed in <> (lower than/greater than) characters. When rendered as HTML, these characters are not escaped correctly to become < and >, which makes the error message appear as "Unterminated  tag" - to see what tag is unterminated you have to browse the HTML source of the error page.
